story:
Once upon a time, in a lush green valley nestled in the northern highlands of Vietnam, there was a small village called La Phu. In this village, there lived a kind and gentle boy named Tuan. Tuan had a deep love for animals, especially the majestic and mysterious birds that filled the skies above the valley.

One sunny afternoon, Tuan was exploring the forest, searching for new and interesting birds, when he stumbled upon a hidden clearing. And there, in the center of the clearing, stood a magnificent and breathtakingly beautiful bird. Its feathers shimmered in the sunlight, as if it had captured the very essence of the sky in its plumage. The bird seemed to sense Tuan's admiration, and it looked directly at him with eyes that twinkled like stars.

"Hello, young one," the bird greeted, in a voice that reminded Tuan of the rustling leaves and the gentle flow of the village river. "I am the Sky Songbird, and I have been watching you for quite some time. I have seen your love for nature, your compassion for animals, and your kind heart."

Tuan was taken aback. Never before had he encountered a bird that could speak! But the Sky Songbird's enchanting presence made him feel at ease.

"I am Tuan," he said, bowing respectfully before the bird. "It is an honor to meet you, Sky Songbird."

The Sky Songbird dipped its head in acknowledgment. "Tuan, I have a quest for you. In the heart of the forest lies a hidden pool, said to grant a single wish to the one who discovers it. Will you embark on this journey and claim this wish for yourself?"

Tuan's heart raced at the prospect. "Yes, Sky Songbird, I will! But what should I wish for?"

The bird studied him for a moment, as though deciding whether or not to reveal the answer. "That, Tuan, is for you to decide. I can only tell you that the wish must be selfless and benefit not just you, but also the world around you."

Tuan nodded solemnly. And so, he set off on a journey that would take him deep into the heart of the forest, across rushing rivers, up treacherous cliffs, and through a tangled web of vines and foliage. Along the way, he encountered creatures he had never seen before, some friendly and curious, while others were wary of the stranger in their midst.

After days of travel, Tuan finally reached the hidden pool. It was truly a sight to behold, with crystal-clear water that seemed to glow in the filtered sunlight. He knelt by the water's edge, dipped his hands into the pool, and closed his eyes. The answer to the Sky Songbird's riddle came to him in that instant.

"I wish for the ability to heal the sick and injured animals of La Phu, so that they may always be by the side of their human friends, providing love, companionship, and joy."

As the words left his lips, Tuan felt a surge of energy flow through him, from the pool and into his very being. He opened his eyes and saw that the water in front of him shimmered, as if the universe itself approved of his selfless wish.

With newfound determination, Tuan returned to La Phu. He found that his new gift allowed him to heal even the most grievous of injuries, from wounds inflicted by predators to maladies that plagued the village's animals. Word of Tuan's miraculous abilities spread throughout the land, and villagers from far and wide came to seek his help.

But Tuan never forgot the Sky Songbird's words about the importance of selflessness. He used his gift to heal the animals without seeking anything in return, and his kind nature earned him the respect and admiration of all who knew him.

As the years passed, Tuan became a wise and respected member of La Phu. He continued to heal animals, passing on his knowledge to younger generations so that they, too, could carry on his work. And when he looked up at the sky, he could still hear the whispers of the Sky Songbird, guiding him on his path.

The Sky Songbird, for its part, knew that it had chosen the right young soul to grant its wish. And for many generations to come, the villagers of La Phu would remember Tuan and his selfless gift, a testament to the boundless love between animals and humans.
